body_html:
@jerrin92: the relevant error is
Cuda Configuration Error: Cannot find libdevice.10.bc under /usr/local/cuda-7.5

You probably have a libdevice.*.10.bc that you can either rename or link to /usr/local/cuda-7.5/nvvm/libdevice/libdevice.10.bc which is where it's needed (at least according to your logs). If you don't have or can't find a libdevice.*.10.bc file, I'd suggest you try reinstalling tf cuda requirements.
